section.p: To renounce the worship of Nai, you must pay 40 Shards to the priesthood by way of compensation.
A samurai watches and sneers, ‘Now that you have lost the goodwill of Nai, you will be easy meat for your enemies.’

Do you want to change your mind?
If you are determined to renounce your faith, pay the 40 Shards and
delete Nai from the God box
on your Adventure Sheet.
